channel.title: Smaller Things
channel.description:
Powered by Autism™, these are the smaller things I get up to. Not as notable, but still interesting I guess.
Simulink uses Unreal Engine. Cry about it, Tim.

item.title: First Entry - iWeb Hell
item.description: I recently remembered that Apple had excellent Apache services in early versions of OS X. I then remembered that they later introduced a consumer WYSIWYG editor as part of iLife. I wanted to refresh my github pages browser experience... so I ended up going with iWeb... or at least... trying to.
